sources.title: Cunningham signs $152m deal to buy out American Creek Resources
sources.snippet: Cunningham Mining (CML) has sealed a definitive agreement to acquire all issued and outstanding common shares of American Creek Resource in an all-cash deal valued at around $152m (C$206.27m). The acquisition of American Creek's shares at C$0.43 each offers its shareholders a 274% premium over the closing price on 5 June 2024.
